nodes.text: The Alliance Military, also referred to as Alliance Armed Forces, the Rebel military, or the Rebel Alliance Military, comprised the military forces of the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War. It consisted of the Alliance Army, the Alliance Fleet, and the Rebel Alliance Starfighter Corps. Chancellor Mon Mothma was the Commander-in-Chief of the military. The Alliance High Command served as the principle authority by which military policy was carried out. Rebel Alliance Intelligence Service served as the Alliance Military's intelligence-gathering and covert operations branch.

During the final days of the Galactic Civil War, the Rebel Alliance defeated the Galactic Empire at the Battle of Endor, which led to the Alliance reorganizing into the New Republic . The Alliance Military was therefore transformed into the New Republic Defense Force.
The Alliance military was rather large; by the time of the Mid Rim Offensive, it included hundreds of battle groups.
The Alliance Military first appeared in the 1977 film, Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope.
